content: 2dc ch2 2dc in corners slip_stitch to the top of the first ch3 to join round 4 blsc every stitch working 3 single_crochet in corners slip_stitch to the top of first single_crochet to join round 5 ch4 double_crochet in corner *skip next 2 stitches cdc ch1 double_crochet next stitch repeat from * to corner working double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch2 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet into each corner in the last corner work double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch2 and slip_stitch into 3rd chain of the first ch4 to join round 6 repeat round 5 rounds 7-8 repeat round 2 © 2021 witherun style
